text: @atrupar What the @VP fails to recognize is that Coronavirus in still with us and the infection rate in some of the states he mentioned such as Texas, is on the increase again.  So his statement here is just nonsense!  Attn: @GOP , @TexasGOP , @WhiteHouse , @FoxNews
